item00.itemDesc: Mysterious red Stone that emits a red light. When crushed provides healing for + 20 Health.

item01.itemDesc: A small device that provides a protective shield that allows you to take extra hits. The shield can be manually deployed to completely block hits, but it can only be used if it is charged.

item02.itemDesc: Used to charge the force shield.

item03.itemDesc: This elixir is a strange substance that can be found in the temple. It is the only item that nullify the dangerous effects of your Infection.

item04.itemDesc: This vile red sub-stance found throughout the temple causes infection to increase by 10. It presents itself in many forms. [Item is never put in inventory, rather it is always immediately used]

item05.itemDesc: These are your ob-ject of obsession within the temple. There are three keys hidden within the temple.

item06.itemDesc: Your main gun that you start with.

item0.itemDesc: This is your side arm that have at the start of the game.

item08.itemDesc: This is the most powerful weapon in the arsenal that you begin with.

item09.itemDesc: This weapon can be found inside the temple. it is slightly stronger than some of your base weapons. It does a dam-age of 9 however each time you use this weapon your Infection goes up by 12.

item10.itemDesc: This weapon is found when killing the Twisted Crawler. The weapon has 7 damage and causes 5+ infection.

item11.itemDesc: This weapon can be found inside the temple it is slightly stronger than some of your base weapons. It does a damage of 14 however each time you use this weapon your Infection goes up by 30.
